articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Greetings to Syrian President
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, sent a message of greeting to Bashar AlÔºçAssad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Monday.
					 The message extended warm greetings to the Syrian president on his 49th birthday.
					
					 It sincerely wished the president good health, expressing the hope that the Syrian people would register fresh victory in their just struggle for defending the sovereignty, peace and security of the country under his correct leadership.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Japanese Delegation
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a Yamanashi Prefectural delegation for Japan-DPRK friendship led by Yasunobu Kanemaru, president of the Television Yamanashi Co., Ltd. which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Delegation of Democratic Women's Union of Korea Leaves for Vietnam, Laos
articles.content:
Delegation of Democratic Women's Union of Korea Leaves for Vietnam, Laos
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea headed by Vice-Chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Union Chae Chun Hui left here on Monday to visit Vietnam and Laos.

articles.title: Delegation of Kyodo News Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Kyodo News Arrives
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Kyodo News headed by its President Masaki Fukuyama arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Delegation of EU-Asia Centre Visits Kim Il Sung's Birthplace
articles.content:
Delegation of EU-Asia Centre Visits Kim Il Sung's Birthplace
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the EU-Asia Centre led by Director Fraser Cameron visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President, who devoted himself to the liberation of the country, its prosperity and the cause of global independence, and on his family members, the guests looked round the relics preserved at the old home with keen interest.
					
					 They also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, etc.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated at DPRK Missions Abroad
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Receptions, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place at the DPRK missions in China, Vietnam, Egypt, Indonesia and Uzbekistan from Sept. 3 to 5 on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and full-length portrait of the Generalissimos standing together. Seen before them were floral baskets and bouquets.
					
					 On display there were photos documenting the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and books and pictures introducing the history of victory and glory covered by the DPRK.
					
					 Present there on invitation were personages of governments, political parties, military, organizations and institutions of relevant countries, diplomatic envoys of different countries and members of the organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and Juche idea study organizations.
					
					 Officials of the DPRK missions in relevant countries were on hand.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress said the foundation of the DPRK was an event that opened a new era in which Korean people became masters of the country.
					
					 A vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of Vietnam expressed pleasure over the great successes achieved by the Korean people in the shining historical course of 66 years.
					
					 The advisor to the Presidential Advisory Council warmly congratulated the Korean people greeting the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The 66 years of the DPRK were proud years in which it, once a weak colonial nation, became a full-fledged power under the guidance of the great President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il, he noted, adding:
					
					 I am rejoiced over the fact that the Korean people are working world-startling miracles and innovations in succession and demonstrating before the world the dignity and might of the DPRK as they are holding the respected HE Kim Jong Un in high esteem.

articles.title: Banquet Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Banquet Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
Moscow, September 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a banquet on September 5 to celebrate the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK. 
					 Present there on invitation were vice-minister of Development of Far East, the director of the Asia 1 Department of the Foreign Ministry, deputies of State Duma of Russia, members of the Russian Federal Assembly, and personages of the Foreign Ministry, Defense Ministry, Ministry of Development of Far East, Ministry of Regional Development, Ministry of Extraordinary Situation, Ministry of Agriculture, Ministry of Education and Science, Ministry of Culture, the United Russia Party, Communist Party of the Russian Federation, A Just Russia, Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, Communist Party of the Soviet Union, Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Russia, Russian Railways Company, Gazprom, Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences, United Nuclear Institute, Moscow War Veterans' Committee, Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, ITAR-TASS, Ria-Novosti and other organizations and organs of the government, parliament and political parties. 
					
					 Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and members of his embassy were present there. 
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Russia highly praised the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who founded the DPRK and turned it into a socialist power, political and ideological power and military power with independent politics, self-supporting economy and self-reliant defence capabilities. 
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to value the history and tradition of the DPRK-Russia friendship and further develop it, he said, expressing the will to make positive efforts to open a fresh heyday in developing the DPRK-Russia friendship. 
					
					 The director of the Asia 1 Department of the Foreign Ministry said in his speech that the solid bond of the Russia-DPRK friendship and cooperation overcame ordeals of history and has developed in an all-round way on the principle of equality, mutual respect and good-neighborly relations for the past 66 years. 
					
					 The director hoped that the Korean people will achieve bigger successes in the work for social and economic development of the country under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. occupation of south Korea was an unpardonable infringement upon the sovereignty which cruelly quelled the aspiration of the Koreans for the nation's independent development and their right to achieve it. It was also an anti-reunification criminal act which laid a big obstacle in the road for national reunification, wrecking peace and increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article.
					
					 The paper cites facts to prove that history of the national division and disgrace began and the Korean nation has suffered untold misfortune and disaster as the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces occupied south Korea on September 8, 1945.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' occupation of south Korea was, indeed, an unpardonable crime which should never be allowed to go on as it is the biggest crime in human history.
					
					 The inhuman crimes committed by the U.S. by mercilessly quenching the desire of the Korean nation for independence and imposing the intolerable misfortune and suffering on it through its forces' illegal presence in south Korea are the most vicious and unjustifiable encroachment upon the sovereignty.
					
					 The U.S. is describing GIs in south Korea as the "deterrent force" for ensuring peace and security and the "guardian" of the south Korean people. But it is a sheer lie as was proven by the 69 year-long history of the U.S. occupation of south Korea.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south are trembling with indignation against the U.S. imperialist aggressors who are hell-bent on all sorts of crimes while violating the sovereignty and dignity of the nation, and are strongly calling for the withdrawal of the GIs from south Korea.
					
					 It is hard to ensure peace and independent reunification of the country without the withdrawal of the GIs, root cause of the national misfortune and suffering.

articles.title: Independent Line Is One of Justice and Truth: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Independent Line Is One of Justice and Truth: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- An independent line is an eternal one of justice and truth which makes one remain unperturbed by whatever difficulties and trials one may face with, and it is also an almighty treasured sword that makes it possible to make the maximum use of the strength of the people to win a victory, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It continued:
					
					 Many countries have plunged into conflict and confrontation as they do not have correct political line and as their politics lack principle. The wrong political line causes tremendous losses.
					
					 It is necessary to pursue independent politics. Only when an independent political programme is advanced and the orientation of the struggle for resolving the policy issues arising in implementing the programme on the principle of independence is set forth, can the line enjoy the support of the people.
					
					 Once set, the line must not be changed.
					
					 One should wage an unflinching struggle against imperialism, well aware that no force can block the struggle for independence of the people.
					
					 It is a foolish self-destruction not to trust in one's own strength and pursue politics that do not reflect the wishes and requirements of the people.
					
					 It is the biggest boon and assets for the prosperity of nations to maintain an independent line.
					
					 It is important to thoroughly adhere to the principle of independence in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliance in national defense.
					
					 It is necessary for the world progressive countries to thoroughly maintain independence in politics, strengthen the nature of self-supporting in economy and increase national defense capacity.
					
					 The DPRK has covered long path of independence, not reading others' faces nor allowing any interference of foreign forces.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will always make a dash for the final victory, holding higher the banner of independence, united close behind supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Protests against U.S. Move to Establish MD
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Protests against U.S. Move to Establish MD
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, a south Korean organization, held a news conference before the building of the defense ministry of the south Korean puppet regime on Sept. 5 in protest against U.S. moves to establish a missile defense system in south Korea.
					 At the press conference, the organization said it was recently disclosed through the media that the U.S. has pressed ahead with its plan to deploy THAAD, the core of the U.S. missile defense system, in the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek, and that the south Korean regime has been examining the plan to deploy it additionally.
					
					 The U.S. is vociferating about the "threat from the north" by exaggerating the situation and distorting the facts in order to deploy THAAD in south Korea, the body said, and continued:
					
					 The deployment of THAAD would make south Korea an advanced base of the U.S. missile defense system and result in dragging south Korea deeper into the military alliance with the U.S.
					
					 The deployment amounts to threatening peace, the body said, urging the south Korean regime to withdraw the plan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Internet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Russian Internet
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us who Are Advancing under the Unfurled Flag Bearing the Immortal Beaming Images of the Great Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" was posted on a website of Russia on Sept. 1.
					 The speech, made by Kim Jong Un at the banquet on August 25, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the Songun feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It calls for dynamically advancing to win a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun started and successfully led by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The website posted the photos of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un inspecting the units of the Korean People's Army respectively.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Brought Out in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Brought Out in Guinea
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in booklet by La Soldarite Publishing House of Guinea.
					 The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetimes. It indicates tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits. 
					
					 The releasing ceremony of the work took place at the publishing house.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea and a publishing house and the masses.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Guinean Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Guinean Personage
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, praised President Kim Il Sung's exploits at the releasing ceremony of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work by La Soldarite Publishing House of Guinea on Sept. 2.
					 Kim Il Sung was the most outstanding leader and peerlessly great man in the 20th century, he said.
					
					 He referred to the significance of the publication of Kim Jong Un's work on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President was an elder statesman who made undying exploits for the country, people, times and revolution with his profound ideology and theory, rare leadership and energetic revolutionary activities and an outstanding and tested leader who always led the Korean revolution to victory under the banner of independence to open and glorify a new modern history.
					
					 He is revered by not only the Korean people but the world people loving progress and peace for his great exploits for the Korean revolution and human cause of independence.
					
					 His exploits will shine forever with the DPRK advancing under the  Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in different countries on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Meeting and film show took place in Bangladesh and Benin and meeting, book exhibition and film show in Ecuador from August 27 to September 1.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the book exhibition were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books dealing with their exploits.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation."
					
					 The president of the Bangladesh People's League said that the DPRK turned into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence for the past 66 years since Kim Il Sung proclaimed to the whole world the foundation of a genuine independent and sovereign state.
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin noted that the foundation of the DPRK was a historic event which brought about a drastic turn in carving out the destiny of the Korean people, stressing victory and glory are always in store for the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea said that exploits Kim Il Sung performed by building the country will shine for all ages.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the great leader who dedicated his whole life to the liberation of the country, happiness of its people and accomplishment of the cause of global independence.
					
					 The socialist cause of the DPRK is triumphantly advancing despite the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK as Kim Jong Un is leading the drive of building a thriving nation by carrying forward the idea and cause of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Benin.

articles.title: Foreign Media Mark DPRK's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Foreign Media Mark DPRK's Founding Anniversary
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carries special write-ups on the occasion of the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The Lao paper Vientiane Mai on Sept. 2 carried an article titled "Founder of the DPRK" illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the founder of the DPRK, the paper said, adding that he paved the way for building the people's power protecting and realizing the interests of the popular masses.
					
					 The Guinean paper Horoya on Sept. 2 in an article titled "Invincible socialist power, the DPRK" noted:
					
					 Kim Il Sung turned the DPRK into a rich and prospering socialist state.
					
					 By carrying forward his cause, Chairman of National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il defended socialism under the banner of Songun, opening a new era of building a thriving nation.
					
					 The might of the DPRK as an invincible socialist power has been fully demonstrated thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Under his guidance the DPRK will shine forever as an invincible socialist power.
					
					 The August issue of the Chinese, Hong Kong magazine International Link carried articles titled "Independent power", "By dint of Songun", etc, illustrated with photos of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Accuses U.S. of Moving for Its Forces' Permanent Presence in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Accuses U.S. of Moving for Its Forces' Permanent Presence in S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Why are the U.S. forces present in south Korea" on its website on August 30 on the lapse of the 69 years since the U.S. forces' occupation of south Korea.
					 Under such subtitles as "Results of hegemonic ambition" and "Illegal occupation" the article citied facts to prove that the U.S. forces illegally occupied the southern part of the Korean peninsula under the pretext of "disarming" the defeated Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Under subtitle "A trick aimed at permanent presence" the article went on:
					
					 The U.S. tried to legalize its forces' permanent presence in south Korea by setting up the Syngman Rhee puppet regime.
					
					 It did not implement the resolution of the 30th Session of the UN General Assembly which called for disorganizing the "UN Command" and withdrawing all foreign forces under the flag of the UN from south Korea.
					
					 During the Cold War, the U.S. worked hard to keep its forces in south Korea for an indefinite period under the plea of "threat" from the Soviet Union.
					
					 But, its justification disappeared after the end of the Cold War and collapse of the Soviet Union.
					
					 Therefore, the U.S. began to spread the "story of threat from north Korea."
					
					 Typical examples are the "missile threat" and "nuclear threat" that disturb the world.
					
					 This is the reason why the U.S. is ceaselessly staging adventurous, test nuclear war drills and preliminary war exercises against the DPRK, deteriorating the situation on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 8 un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad, con motivo de su cumpleanos.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Le extiendo a Vd. mis calurosas felicitaciones por su 49o cumpleanos.
					
					Formulo sinceros votos por la buena salud de Vd. deseando que bajo su correcta direccion, el pueblo arabe de Siria logre nueva victoria en su lucha justa por defender la soberania, la paz y la seguridad del pais.

articles.title: Portavoz del CRPP urge poner fin a la ocupacion de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del CRPP urge poner fin a la ocupacion de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo de que pasaron 69 anos desde cuando el imperialismo norteamericano ocupo ilegalmente el Sur de Crea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 7 una declaracion.
					El documento senala que el 8 de septiembre de 1945, Estados Unidos ocupo el suelo surcoreano bajo el pretexto de "desarmar al ejercito japones", lo cual fue el inicio de coloniaje mas astuto y brutal en sustitucion al imperialismo japones.
					
					Debido a la ocupacion del Sur de Corea por EE.UU., la nacion coreana se vio obligada a sufrir las desgracias causadas por la division en el Norte y el Sur sin precedentes en la historia y hasta los desastres de guerra desatada por los yanquis, recuerda la nota y prosigue:
					
					Bajo el dominio y ocupacion de EE.UU., el Sur de Corea se convirtio en su base militar para la agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Asia, la hegemonia mundial y para la guerra nuclear y nuestra nacion vive con el permanente peligro de guerra.
					
					EE.UU. no desea la reconciliacion, unidad y reunificacion de nuestra nacion, sino instiga a los titeres surcoreanos a hostilizar a la RPDC y pelear entre los connacionales.
					
					Si se tolera la ocupacion militar de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea, no se puede pensar en el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas, la paz y reunificacion del pais ni en la prosperidad de la nacion.
					
					Es urgente poner fin a la ocupacion del imperialismo norteamericano, causa de todos los sufrimientos y calamidades de nuestra nacion.
					
					Ya paso mucho tiempo desde que EE.UU. fingia ser "protector" y "ayudante" del Sur de Corea y nadie desea que las tropas agresoras yanquis se mantengan en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Antes de ser expulsado del territorio surcoreano por la rebeldia mas fuerte de la nacion coreana y sufrir la destruccion final por el despiadado ataque de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC, EE.UU. debe regresar a casa junto con sus tropas agresoras abandonando la anacronica politica de ocupacion del Sur de Corea y la politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben suplicar la presencia permanente de las tropas agresoras de EE.UU.
					
					Si el "poder" actual del Sur de Corea desea de veras el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, tiene que renunciar la politica proyanqui y la de servilismo a las potencias, cesar todos los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC y tomar la decision de evacuar del suelo surcoreano a las tropas norteamericanas.
					
					He aqui la clave fundamental para la paz y reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas.
